This _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [dogslicer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=405)_ is obviously the work of a brilliant but scrappy artisan who valued versatility over safety. Four toothy gems line the blade's cutting edge, three of which glow—one with fiery red light, one with a chill blue, and one that gives off sparks—while the last is a glistening black. Each of these gems embodies a weapon property rune, but only one rune can be active at a time.

**Activate—Gem Twist** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** You twist the gem along the blade corresponding with the desired weapon property rune: red for [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2838), blue for [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2839), or yellow for [shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2847). You take 1d6 damage of the type the chosen rune deals. You can instead twist the black gem to disable the active property rune, taking no damage.
